metadata.title: CVE-2023-2269 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service problem was found, due to a possible recursive lockingscenario, resulting in a deadlock in table_clear in drivers/md/dm-ioctl.cin the Linux Kernel Device Mapper-Multipathing sub-component.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
